original_text: So Israel’s sons were among those who went to buy grain, for there was famine in the land of Canaan also.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 아들들이 양식 사러 간 자 중에 있으니 가나안 땅에 기근이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: So Israel's sons were among those who went to buy grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘의 아들들은 곡식을 사러 간 사람들 중에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: for there was famine in the land of Canaan also
